body.string: {"access_token": "<ACCESS_TOKEN>", "token_type": "bearer", "expires_in": 3600, "scope": "account creddits edit flair history identity livemanage modconfig modcontributors modflair modlog modmail modothers modposts modself modtraffic modwiki mysubreddits privatemessages read report save structuredstyles submit subscribe vote wikiedit wikiread"}

{"default_theme_sr": null, "threaded_messages": true, "hide_downs": false, "label_nsfw": true, "activity_relevant_ads": true, "email_messages": true, "profile_opt_out": false, "video_autoplay": true, "third_party_site_data_personalized_content": true, "show_link_flair": true, "show_trending": true, "private_feeds": true, "monitor_mentions": true, "public_server_seconds": false, "research": false, "ignore_suggested_sort": false, "send_crosspost_messages": true, "email_digests": false, "layout": 0, "num_comments": 200, "clickgadget": true, "use_global_defaults": false, "show_snoovatar": false, "over_18": false, "show_stylesheets": true, "live_orangereds": true, "enable_default_themes": false, "legacy_search": false, "domain_details": false, "collapse_left_bar": true, "lang": "en", "hide_ups": false, "third_party_data_personalized_ads": true, "allow_clicktracking": true, "hide_from_robots": false, "show_twitter": false, "compress": false, "store_visits": false, "threaded_modmail": false, "design_beta": false, "min_link_score": -4, "media_preview": "subreddit", "show_location_based_recommendations": true, "nightmode": false, "highlight_controversial": false, "geopopular": "GLOBAL", "third_party_site_data_personalized_ads": true, "survey_last_seen_time": null, "min_comment_score": -4, "public_votes": false, "collapse_read_messages": false, "show_flair": true, "mark_messages_read": true, "search_include_over_18": false, "no_profanity": true, "hide_ads": false, "beta": false, "top_karma_subreddits": true, "newwindow": false, "numsites": 25, "media": "subreddit", "send_welcome_messages": true, "show_gold_expiration": false, "highlight_new_comments": true, "email_unsubscribe_all": false, "default_comment_sort": "confidence", "accept_pms": "everyone"}

headers.Cache-Control: private, s-maxage=0, max-age=0, must-revalidate, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
headers.Set-Cookie: csv=1; Max-Age=63072000; Domain=.reddit.com; Path=/; Secure; SameSite=None
